input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
ValuePack (2 Count): Digital Replacement Camera and Camcorder Battery for Canon BP-718, BP-709, BP-727 - Includes Lens Pouch

Product keywords:
Includes TWO Compatible Rechargeable Lithium Ion Digital Batteries With No Memory Effect and ONE Leatherette Camera/Lens Accessories Pouch 15 X 24 Centimeters.
18 Months Manufacturer Warranty, Engineered and Manufactured Under European Standard ISO 9001. Guaranteed Superior Quality Meets or Exceeds High Priced OEM Products.
1600 mAh, 3.7 Volts, CE Approved, ROHS Compliant.
Protective Retail Packaging, Each Product is wrapped with an inner plastic bag and outer box packaging.
Exclusive Offering of High Performance, Long Lasting, and Durable Grade A Cell Battery
Meets and exceeds high-priced OEM products, allowing you to power your camera/camcorder with a superior-quality battery for a fraction of the price
Compatibilities: Camera models: LEGRIA HF M506, LEGRIA HF M52, LEGRIA HF M56, LEGRIA HF R306, LEGRIA HF R36, LEGRIA HF R37, LEGRIA HF R38, VIXIA HF M50, VIXIA HF M500, VIXIA HF M52, VIXIA HF R30, VIXIA HF R300, VIXIA HF R32, VIXIA HF R40, VIXIA HF R400, VIXIA HF R42. 
Battery models: BP-709, BP709, BP-727 BP727

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Introducing the Paul & Taylor Men's Leather Checkbook Cover Bifold Wallet, available in a variety of colors to suit your style. Made from premium leather, this wallet is built to last and looks stunning. It features a carbon copy separator and currency compartment, making it perfect for keeping your finances organized. The extra slot and pen holder provide ample storage space, while the pull-out album complete with six card and photo slots allows you to easily access your important documents. With its slim line and simple design, this wallet is both practical and fashionable. So why settle for a boring, mass-produced wallet when you can have a stylish and durable leather option? Upgrade your accessory game and order the Paul & Taylor Men's Leather Checkbook Cover Bifold Wallet today!
input_text.Response B:
We are offering you a ValuePack of two (2) Rechargeable Lithium Ion Digital Replacement Camera and Camcorder Batteries for Canon BP-718, BP-709, BP-727, BP709, BP727. These high-quality, long-lasting batteries are engineered and manufactured under European Standard ISO 9001. Each product is wrapped with an inner plastic bag and outer box packaging.

This ValuePack is an exclusive offering of high performance, long-lasting, and durable Grade A Cell Batteries. It comes with one (1) Leatherette Camera/Lens Accessories Pouch 15 x 24 Centimeters.

Guaranteed Superior Quality Meets or Exceeds High Priced OEM Products. Each product is tested under the most stringent conditions before being shipped to you. All batteries are CE approved and ROHS compliant.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
